mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lidner, Edward to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lidner, Edward
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 5 1863. By Telegraph from New York 5 1863. Are the five hundred Lindners Carbines in the field & where please answer Edwd Lindner ae[?] then fire 13G36pd [page 2] Ansd there are 500 here HJS AG Va
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lidner, Edward
New York City, New York
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
